room_title: Escape room "Game of Pirates" by Riddle in Mashpee
review: We have played two games at Riddle (Pirates - we won the treasure! and 1980's - we almost made it out!). We had so much fun! Johnny was our game master both times and he was fabulous! I mean totally rad - aaarrrghhh!

room_title: Escape room "Game of Pirates" by Riddle in Mashpee
review: My team was just a few steps away from escaping the pirate-themed room. So much fun! Noah was an amazing game-master. Thanks for a great time!

room_title: Escape room "Game of Pirates" by Riddle in Mashpee
review: We did the pirate room with my son and his friends for a birthday party, all the kids being 13-14. We had an absolute blast! We were able to solve it with 5 minutes to spare! It was fun and exciting. We look forward to going again!
